texts.text: Telltale Games (formerly known as Telltale, Incorporated) was an American independent digital publisher based in San Rafael, California. The studio included designers formerly employed by LucasArts, and was responsible for developing Minecraft: Story Mode and Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two alongside Mojang Studios.[1]
On September 21, 2018, the company announced that it would be shutting down, and that all future projects were cancelled.[2] The company later began assignment proceedings in October of 2018.[3]

1 Employees
1.1 Business
1.2 Game development (Creative Director, Writer, etc.)
1.3 Web/system development
2 Games
3 References
4 External links
Telltale Games developed or published the following original games, with most of them in an episodic structure:

Telltale Texas Hold'em (PC, 2005)
Bone: Out from Boneville (PC/OSX, 2005)
CSI: 3 Dimensions of Murder (PC/PS2, 2006)
Bone: The Great Cow Race (PC, 2006)
Sam & Max Save the World (PC/360/Wii, 2006–2007)
CSI: Hard Evidence (PC/OSX/Wii/360, 2007)
Sam & Max Beyond Time and Space (PC/360/Wii/OSX/PS3/iOS, 2007–2008)
Strong Bad's Cool Game for Attractive People (PC/Wii/PS3/OSX, 2008)
Wallace & Gromit's Grand Adventures (PC/360/iOS, 2009)
Tales of Monkey Island (PC/Wii/OSX/PS3/iOS, 2009)
CSI: Deadly Intent (PC/360/Wii, 2009)
Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse (PC/OSX/PS3/iOS, 2010)
Nelson Tethers: Puzzle Agent (PC/OSX/PS3/iOS, 2010)
CSI: Fatal Conspiracy (PC/PS3/360/Wii, 2010)
Poker Night at the Inventory (PC/OSX, 2010)
Hector: Badge of Carnage (PC/OSX/iOS, 2010–2011)
Back to the Future: The Game (PC/OSX/PS3/iOS/Wii, 2010–2011)
Puzzle Agent 2 (PC/OSX/iOS, 2011)
Jurassic Park: The Game (PC/OSX/PS3/360/iOS, 2011)
Law & Order: Legacies (PC/OSX/iOS, 2011–2012)
The Walking Dead: Season One (PC/OSX/PS/Xbox/iOS/AND/Fire/NSwitch, 2012)
Poker Night 2 (PC/OSX/PS3/360/iOS, 2013)
The Wolf Among Us (PC/OSX/PS/Xbox/iOS/AND/Fire, 2013–2014)
The Walking Dead: Season Two (PC/OSX/PS/Xbox/iOS/OUYA/AND/Fire/NSwitch, 2013–2014)
Telltale Games Collection (ONE, 2014)
Tales from the Borderlands (PC/OSX/PS/Xbox/iOS/AND/Fire, 2014–2015)
Game of Thrones (PC/OSX/PS/Xbox/iOS/AND/Fire, 2014-2015)
The Jackbox Party Pack (PS/Xbox, 2015)
Minecraft: Story Mode (PC/OSX/iOS/AND/Fire/Xbox/PS/WiiU/APLTV/NSwitch/Win10, 2015-2016)
The Walking Dead: Michonne (PC/macOS/PS/Xbox/iOS/AND/Fire, 2016)
7 Days to Die (PS4/ONE, 2016)
Batman: The Telltale Series (PC/macOS/PS/ONE/iOS/AND/NSwitch, 2016)
Mr. Robot:1.51exfiltrati0n.ipa (iOS/AND, 2016)
The Walking Dead: A New Frontier (PC/macOS/PS4/ONE/iOS/AND/NSwitch, 2016-2017)
Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series (PC/PS4/ONE/NSwitch/iOS/AND/Fire, 2017)
Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two (PC/macOS/PS4/Xbox/NSwitch/iOS/AND/Fire/Win10, 2017)
Batman: The Enemy Within (PC/macOS/PS4/ONE/iOS/AND/Win10/NSwitch, 2017-2018)
RGX: Showdown (PS4/ONE, 2018)
The Walking Dead: The Final Season (PC/PS4/ONE/Win10/NSwitch, 2018-2019)
